official_title: Recitation Instructor and Research Associate, CBER Coordinator of Business Teaching Support
bio:
Chenjie Huang graduated from NYU Stern and joined NYU Shanghai as a Global Academic Fellow in business in 2014. After two years, she joined the Center for Business Education and Research as a recitation instructor and her primary research interests are data-driven marketing and advertising. 

Research Interests

  • Data-driven marketing
  • Advertising

Courses Taught

  • Foundations of Finance
  • Introduction to Marketing

Education

  • B.S. in Finance and BS/MS in Accounting with minor in Mathematics, New York University, Leonard N. Stern School of Business, 2014
